title: SMC_NCScanner_DelimConfig (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_NCScanner_DelimConfig : STRUCT
This structure allows to configure the delimiters used by
the tokenizer.  The delimiters determine how comments are
detected, what is a valid operator and so on.

rows.Name: byCmtMultiStartDelim
rows.Comment:
Start delimiter for single character multi line comments,
preconfigured with â(â.  Set to 0 to disable single char
comments.
SeeSMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiterson how to reconfigure.

rows.Name: byCmtMultiEndDelim
rows.Comment:
End delimiter for multi line comments, preconfigured with â)â.
SeeSMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiterson how to reconfigure.

rows.Name: wCmtMultiStartDelim
rows.Comment:
Two-character start delimiter for multi line comments.
(Could be set to â(â or â/â.)
SeeSMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiterson how to reconfigure.

rows.Name: wCmtMultiEndDelim
rows.Comment:
Two-character start delimiter for multi line comments tokens.
(Could be set to â)â or â/â.)
SeeSMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiterson how to reconfigure.

rows.Name: aCmtSingleStartDelim
rows.Comment:
Start delimiters for single line comments tokens,
preconfigured with â%â.
SeeSMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiterson how to reconfigure.

rows.Name: aVarBracketStartDelim
rows.Comment:
Start delimiters for variable tokens which are in âbracketsâ,
preconfigured with â$â.
SeeSMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiterson how to reconfigure.

rows.Name: aVarBracketEndDelim
rows.Comment:
End delimiters for variable tokens which are in âbracketsâ,
preconfigured with â$â.
SeeSMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiterson how to reconfigure.

rows.Name: aVarPrefixDelim
rows.Comment:
Delimiters for variable tokens which start with a
prefix delimiter, preconfigured to 0 (disabled).
SeeSMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiterson how to reconfigure.

rows.Name: aLocalVarPrefixDelim
rows.Comment:
Delimiters for local variable tokens which start with a
prefix delimiter, preconfigured to â#â.
SeeSMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiterson how to reconfigure.

rows.Name: aStrStartDelim
rows.Comment:
Start delimiters for string tokens, preconfigured with â and â.
SeeSMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiterson how to reconfigure.

rows.Name: aStrEndDelim
rows.Comment:
End delimiters for string tokens, preconfigured with â and â.
SeeSMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiterson how to reconfigure.

rows.Name: aVarNameChrs
rows.Comment:
Additional characters for variable names.
must be of the same size as abyPossibleOperators
